name: Wrath of the Leak King
description:
Controls
  • Jump! and Double Jump!, you can long press a bit to jump higher: Spacebar or A button
  • Split yourself in half!: Alt or B Button, use fullscreen mode to avoid Alt to take you out of the game into the browser Menu!!
  • Join again!: Just walk into another bubble
  • Change bubble!: Shift or X Button, to roll across all the bubbles
